Title: Quest for the Sword of Starlight
Credits: Created by Adam Smith (amsmith@ucsc.edu), Extended by Ella Fontenot.

Foothills Camp.Body: You stand at the base of Mount Doom. Mist shrouds its peak. The wind howls. A river rushes north. A mountain path leads west.

Rushing River.Body: The river is wild and fast. A broken raft lies nearby.

Death by Drowning.Body: The current pulls you under. Your quest ends here.

Troll Bridge.Body: A foul-smelling troll blocks a rickety rope bridge. 'I want meat!' he snarls.

Troll Fight.Body: The troll clubs you into the mud. Your vision fades. Game over.

Echoing Cavern.Body: Your voice echoes eerily. A stone pedestal invites you to sing or shout.

Cave Collapse.Body: Your shout causes the cavern to collapse behind you. You must return to the Foothills.

Crystal Grove.Body: Crystals shimmer in the gloom. A pedestal holds the Rune of Radiance.

Rune Acquired.Body: You have acquired the Rune of Radiance. It glows with untold power.

Sword Shrine.Body: A massive stone door blocks your way. It glows faintly.

Choices.Text: Use Rune to open the door

Door Blocked.Body: You push against the massive stone door, but it refuses to move. The rune-shaped indentation in the center glows faintly, as if waiting for something. Without the Rune of Radiance, you won't be able to proceed.

Enter Shrine.Body: The shrine opens. Inside lies the Sword of Starlight.

Choices.Text: Take the sword and ascend the summit

Wizard's Summit.Body: With the Sword of Starlight in hand, you face Maldrak the Dread in a swirl of shadow and flame.

Victory.Body: Your strike shatters Maldrak's staff. Light floods the sky. You have saved the realm.

Defeat.Body: You fall to your knees. Maldrak laughs. Darkness reigns.
